name: Oneplus buds
description: The OnePlus Buds offer 30-hour battery life, IP55 water resistance, Bluetooth 5.0, deep bass, and noise cancellation for calls.

name: Samsung S23 fe
description: AMOLED 120 Hz display, 50MP triple camera, Exynos 2200 processor, and a 4500mAh battery.

name: Noise watch
description: The Noise Smartwatch comes with a 1.4 HD touch display, heart rate and SpO2 monitoring, sleep tracking, and a 7-day battery life.

name: Realme Buds
description: The Realme Buds provide 20-hour battery life, instant pairing with Bluetooth 5.2, and rich bass with noise isolation.

name: Noise Twist Smartwatch
description: The Noise Twist Smartwatch features a 1.38 AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling, multiple fitness modes, and a 10-day battery life.

name: Oneplus Nord CE
description: The OnePlus Nord CE boasts a 6.43 AMOLED 90Hz display, 64MP triple rear camera, Snapdragon 750G processor, and a 4500mAh battery.

name: Samsung Buds
description: The Samsung Buds deliver premium audio with active noise cancellation, deep bass, and a 22-hour battery life.

name: Oneplus 11
description: The OnePlus 11 features a 6.7 AMOLED 120Hz display, Hasselblad 50MP triple cameras, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and a 5000mAh battery.

name: Firebolt Smartwatch
description: The Fire-Boltt Smartwatch offers a 1.3 HD display, SpO2 and fitness tracking, IP67 waterproofing, and an 8-day battery life.
